notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!
ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.

taskDescription:
Rewrite <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mn>9</mn>
  <mfrac>
    <mn>5</mn>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mn>14</mn>
    </mrow>
  </mfrac>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">9\frac{5}{{14}}</annotation></semantics></math> as an improper fraction.
